basics.name: Benny Trieu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hello, my name is Benny. I am an undergraduate studying for a Computer Science degree at University of Hawaii at Manoa. I plan to graduate on spring 2023.

courses: ICS Discreet Math I & II (ICS 141 & ICS 241)

work.summary: Part-time Crew member for the Mcdonald's company
highlights: Took down the customer’s orders and worked at the cashier
Made the drinks for the customers
Cleaned the trays after they were done being used by the customers
Help sweep and clean up the floors when they got dirty

volunteer.summary: Support and give help to the farmer's market
highlights: Volunteering would start only on 2nd and 4th friday of the month
Helped with the transactions of the vegetables being sold at the farmer's market
Recorded down the amount of vegetables sold and the amount of vegetables left
Helped disassemble the farmer's market after the event was over

volunteer.summary: Help promote physical activity to kids
highlights: Encourage kids to sign up for tennis lessons
Interact and help with the prize wheel

volunteer.summary: Nurture and help educate the children in the environment
highlights: Facilitated and helped clean up areas for kids to play on
Attended to and interacted with the children
Helped out parents and their services

awards.title: Charles R Hemenway Scholarship
awards.summary: This was awarded to me for having a minimum GPA of 2.0, having good citizenship, and by being enrolled to University of Hawaii at Manoa as a full time student

awards.title: Hawaii Veterans Memorial Scholarship
awards.summary: This was awarded to me similarly to the Charles R Hemenway Scholarship for having a minimum GPA of 2.0, having good citizenship, and by being enrolled to University of Hawaii at Manoa as a full time student

awards.title: Most Inspirational Athlete
awards.summary: This was awarded as a sign of showing the most improvement and hard effort in the team. This medal was awarded to me since I have improved a lot in my senior year of Tennis and have put in a lot of time and effort in my tennis season.

awards.title: Teisei Tengan Memorial Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded for recognition of my accomplishments of my four years of high school
